Template.SubjectPart: You've Agreed To Be A Supporter!
Template.HtmlPart:
Hi {{name}},

You have agreed to act as a supporter for {{borrower}} in the {{company}} Credit Program.

You have pledged {{pledge_amount}} as a maximum amount to support any loan application that {{borrower}} makes through the Program.

Please log in to the Credit Program portal if you wish to adjust your maximum pledge.

Best wishes,

Arboreum, on behalf of {{company}}
